localization.ja: アイエックスレジャー

description.en:
iXledger is a groundbreaking platform for insurance utilising blockchain. iXledger is founded in London 2017, through encouragement of clients interested in efficiencies enabled through innovative technology. Our aim is to create an alternative insurance platform. The architecture utilises a cutting edge stack consisting of React, NodeJS, Ethereum and OrientDB.

Blockchain Insurance
Getting insurance for your blockchain business presents various challenges: where to start, how to find the right specialist insurers, and how to ensure you have the right cover. By sourcing your insurance via iXledger you can:

Manage the risks your business faces
Increase the legitimacy of your venture
Show potential investors and other interested third parties your smart insurance contract on the Ethereum

ico_data.short_desc: An Insurance Solution based on Blockchain
ico_data.description: InsureX is a marketplace for insurance based on blockchain technology. It is aimed primarily at institutions such as insurers, reinsurers and brokers. Bringing these participants together directly results in an efficient, cost-effective and transparent marketplace. Smart contracts provide support for streamlined processes between multiple parties.
